title: Rune Page Bugged
body: I am unable to change my runes or save them. I submitted a support ticket and got no response. Please help! It is very frustrating

replies.body: This little poro had to dig around in the back a little bit, but those rune pages should be fixed now. You may need to set them up again, but at least you'll be able to edit and select them again!
Thank you so much! you are my hero
